data.title: Hortense de Beauharnais, the Princess Louis, Holding the Hand of Her Son, Prince Napoleon-Charles; verso: Faint Sketch of a Head
data.meta_description: Hortense de Beauharnais (1783-1837), wife of Louis Bonaparte; her son, Napoleon-Louis-Charles, called Louis (1802-1807)
data.text:
THIS WORK MAY NOT BE LENT BY THE TERMS OF ITS ACQUISITION TO THE HARVARD ART MUSEUMS.

The Harvard Art Museums encourage the use of images found on this website for personal, noncommercial use, including educational and scholarly purposes. To request a higher resolution file of this image, please submit an online request.
